select: SELECT PIC.RSTURT_MNG_ID , PIC.PIC_SEQ , MAP.LNG , MAP.LAT , RST.RNK , (SELECT RSTURT_ID FROM RSTURT_CD_DATA RST_CD WHERE RST_CD.RSTURT_ID = RST.RSTURT_ID ) AS RST_NM , ADDR.SIDO , ADDR.GUGUN , ADDR.RI , ADDR.DONG , ADDR.BLDG , ADDR.BUNJI , (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT REW_SEQ) FROM REW REW WHERE REW.RSTURT_MNG_ID = RST.RSTURT_MNG_ID ) AS REW_NM FROM RSTURT_INFO RST INNER JOIN PIC PIC ON PIC.RSTURT_MNG_ID = RST.RSTURT_MNG_ID INNER JOIN WSH WSH ON WSH.RSTURT_MNG_ID = RST.RSTURT_MNG_ID INNER JOIN MAP MAP ON MAP.RSTURT_MNG_ID = RST.RSTURT_MNG_ID INNER JOIN ADDR ADDR ON RST.ADDR_SEQ = ADDR.ADDR_SEQ WHERE WSH.USER_ID = #{create_id};
